_header: Upon a time there rose a strife
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo Sancti Bartholomei’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Uppon a tyme þer ros a strifA mong þe disciplus
                    ryf…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He vs graunte þer to woneÞat is mon and godus
                    sone
